EnhancedContent: The above title marked as MS latest available to update which I did and up came install error 0x80070103 try again, now in settings windows update it exclaims ' attention needed', on inspection of the already installed list it says A-Volute-Extension installed ?, but the warning attention needed is still there. My question is will this 'extension' interfere with any future updates, and what the hell is the extension ?
Title: A-Volute-Extension
Description: The above title marked as MS latest available to update which I did and up came install error 0x80070103 try again, now in settings windows update it exclaims ' attention needed', on inspection of the already installed list it says A-Volute-Extension installed ?, but the warning attention needed is still there. My question is will this 'extension' interfere with any future updates, and what the hell is the extension ?
Author: Finebns
